hero.name: Nanda Raditya
hero.heading: Hay! Iâ€™m Nanda
hero.description: I am a UI/UX Designer and Front-end Developer who is able to create engaging and highly competitive digital experiences. With a focus on innovative design and responsive development, I combine design and technical expertise to deliver stunning and functional solutions. Let's explore my works that combine inspiring aesthetics with powerful function

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR UI UX DESIGN PROJECTS
about.description: I am a UI/UX Designer and Front-end Developer with a deep love for creating amazing digital experiences. With a background in design and development, I believe that a combination of creativity and technicality is the key to creating great products. Over the years, I have explored various projects from concept to launch, enriching myself with extensive knowledge in the industry. From mobile apps to websites, I bring solid design and development skills to ensure each project reaches its maximum potential. I am excited to continue learning and collaborating with individuals and teams to design innovative and meaningful solutions. Welcome to explore more about me and my works

details.title: E-learning App
details.description: My Planet Enseval is an e-learning tools specifically designed to support the training process of trainers and employees in an industry. Through this tools, users will have access to learning modules in the form of videos and post tests are also available as an evaluation tool.

details.title: Bootcamp website for Enseval Internship programs
details.description: Enseval Bootcamp is a website used by Enseval Mentees in undergoing internship programs at Enseval, this website will be used for Mentees to make daily reports and will be used by mentors to assess their Mentees and issue their certificates

details.title: E-commerce App
details.description: Shamo Store is an e-commerce platform that specifically presents the best collection of sneakers. a wide selection of trendy and exclusive sneakers can be found at Shamo Store, a place where style and comfort meet at every step.

details.title: Dashboard Design
details.description: This dashboard is tailored for admins to monitor website data and perform regular maintenance tasks. With an intuitive interface, it offers insights into site performance, traffic analytics, content, and user management. Its advanced features make it an invaluable tool for ensuring optimal website performance.

details.title: E-wallet App
details.description: Sha Bank is an innovative and practical e-wallet application, designed to make it easier for users to carry out various financial transactions digitally. With Sha Bank, you can access a number of features and benefits that make your financial life easier, safer and more efficient.

details.title: E-learning Web
details.description: My Planet Enseval is an e-learning tools specifically designed to support the training process of trainers and employees in an industry. Through this tools, users will have access to learning modules in the form of videos and post tests are also available as an evaluation tool.

details.title: Travel Web
details.description: Jalan Yuk is an online platform that provides an unforgettable tourism experience for travelers. With a wide selection of travel packages tailored to your needs and interests, Jalan Yuk makes it easy for you to plan and book an exciting adventure without any hassle.

details.title: Psikotest Web
details.description: DCT Psychometric Test is an online recruitment platform designed for DCT recruitment teams. It features separate interfaces for administrators and users, facilitating seamless psychometric test processes. Admins can manage recruitment tasks efficiently, while candidates can conveniently complete psychometric tests online. With user-friendly functionalities, DCT Psychometric Test streamlines the recruitment journey for both administrators and candidates.

allService.title: UI/UX Design
allService.subTitle: I use Figma and Adobe XD to create interesting and stunning designs. With a focus on user experience, I strive to create solutions that meet your project needs and vision. From concept to implementation, I will work closely with you to ensure the success of the design produced.

allService.title: Website Development
allService.subTitle: I developed the user interface with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React JS, and implemented the backend with Laravel for a responsive and efficient solution. From concept to launch, I ensure your website development is carried out with the utmost care and quality.

allService.title: Mobile Apps Development
allService.subTitle: I develop mobile applications using Flutter, providing efficient cross-platform solutions. My focus is ensuring your app has the highest quality and engaging user experience. With a user-centric approach, I strive to create applications that meet user needs

allService.title: Graphic Design
allService.subTitle: I produce stunning graphic designs with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. From logos to marketing materials, each of my pieces is created with attention to detail to perfectly reflect your brand. With a focus on creativity and quality, I am ready to help realize your design vision.

companyDescription: Conducted in-depth research with potential users to understand their needs and preferences in the user experience.
Designed and developed initial wireframes as a foundational framework for product design.
Produced high-fidelity designs with a keen focus on visual details, consistency, and technical feasibility.
Created efficient user flows to guide users through the interaction process within the application or website.
Built a logical and easily understandable information architecture
Created functional design prototypes to illustrate user interface interactions and workflows.
Regularly conducted usability testing to gather feedback from users and refined designs based on findings.
Implemented user interface designs (UI Design) into front-end web code using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Implemented user interface designs (UI Design) into front-end mobile application code using Flutter technology
Collaborated closely with development teams and stakeholders to ensure alignment between design and product functionality
Ensured the final product adhered to design principles, performance standards, and user requirements
Design visually appealing and user-friendly websites with high-fidelity mockups.
Conduct usability testing to gather valuable user feedback for design refinement.
Implement user interface designs (UI Design) into front-end web code using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on ReactJS for dynamic and responsive solutions.
Collaborate closely with project managers and developers throughout the design and development process

sectionHeading.title: Get in Touch!
sectionHeading.subTitle: Feel free to contact me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
